name: Circulator (VR)
description:
Made by : Yanfang Xu, Qirong Yin

Made with: Unreal Engine Blue Print

Programming: Yanfang Xu

Concept Art: Qirong Yin

Gameplay: Yanfang Xu, Qirong Yin_______________________________________________________________________________________

This project presents the future network world with virtual reality technology and elaborates with specific events the problems that will arise in the future currency financial sector of block-chain and the corresponding solutions.

Gameplay description: Players will take on the role of circulator (profession), removing virus data from the online world and maintaining the stability of the online and offline worlds.

HOW TO OPERATE:

VR Controller: Toggle rocker to move forward, A button to attack, grip hand grip to pick up

The project file is larger than 1GB, making it impossible to upload. :(
